channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Struts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Struts

item.title: CVE-2023-34149|2024-08-02T16:01:54.169Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20struts
item.description:
Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation Apache Struts.This issue affects Apache Struts: through 2.5.30, through 6.1.2.
Upgrade to Struts 2.5.31 or 6.1.2.1 or greater.

item.title: CVE-2023-34396|2024-08-02T16:10:06.825Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20struts
item.description:
Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation Apache Struts.This issue affects Apache Struts: through 2.5.30, through 6.1.2.
